title: How To: Virtual Superhero Walk/Run
author: Autism Connections Fredericton
cardDescription: In this video, you can find details about how our 10th annual Superhero FunRun/Walk for Autism will look. We are so excited to share this exciting news with you all and cannot wait to see everyone's photos, June 27th 2020.
